content: **knitted vest with v- neck in drops flora size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fl-054 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 150-150-200-200-200-250 g colour no 07 beige **knitting gauge ** 24 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 60 or 80 cm for edges in stocking stitch drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 and 60 cm or 80 for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
